00010 DockWidgetPrivate::DockWidgetPrivate(Aki::DockWidget* qq)
00011     : QObject(),
00012     dockBar(0),
00013     dockButton(0),
00014     icon(KIcon()),

00020 
00021 void
00022 DockWidgetPrivate::autoHideToggled(bool checked)
00023 {
00024     emit _q->dockAutoHideStateChanged(checked);
00025 }
00026 
00027 void
00028 DockWidgetPrivate::dockCustomContextMenuRequested()
00029 {
00030     contextMenu->exec(QCursor::pos());
00031 }
00032 
00033 void
00034 DockWidgetPrivate::setupActions()
00035 {
00036     contextMenu = new QMenu(_q);
00037 
00038     autoHideAction = new QAction(i18n("Auto-Hide"), contextMenu);
00039     autoHideAction->setCheckable(true);
00040     autoHideAction->setChecked(true);
00041     connect(autoHideAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00042             SLOT(autoHideToggled(bool)));
00043 }
